mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOTO_SPORTS( SPORTS_GUBUN, SPORTS_LEAGUE_NAME, SPORTS_TEAM1, SPORTS_TEAM2, SPORTS_SCHEDULE, SPORTS_WIN_BET, SPORTS_DRAW_BET, SPORTS_LOSE_BET, REG_CUST_NO, REG_DT, REG_IP, USE_YN ) VALUES ( #{sportsGubun}, #{sportsLeagueName}, #{sportsTeam1}, #{sportsTeam2}, #{sportsSchedule}, #{sportsWinBet}, #{sportsDrawBet}, #{sportsLoseBet}, #{regCustNo}, NOW(), #{regIp}, 'Y' )
